name: Flying Nuisance
ability: Flight (This anima can pass over non-traversable spaces as long as it's destination is traversable. While this anima isn't attacking% it is 1 space above the ground.)

name: Hot-Stone Hogling
ability: Add 1 to Hot-Stone Hogling's base attack if it is near a lava or stone tile. (To be near a board piece is to be on or adjacent to it.)

name: Basalt-Blood Nil
ability: If Basalt-Blood Nil would die% you may remove a nearby lava tile from the board instead. If you do% Basalt-Blood Nhil's HP becomes 1 (To be near a board piece is to be on or adjacent to it.)

name: Immolation Pest
ability:
Flight (This anima can pass over non-traversable spaces as long as it's destination is traversable. Units without flight cannot initiate combat with this anima)
When Immolation Pest dies% it deals 1 direct fire damage to target enemy anima in an adjacent space.

name: Hu-Dyi Firewalker
ability:
Dash (this anima may move twice each turn.)
Place a lava tile on each space Hu-Dyi Firewalker lands on (Board pieces land on spaces where its movement stops.)

name: Erzog Stone-Caster
ability: {A}{A}: Erzog Stone-Caster deals 6 defendable damage to target enemy anima within four spaces. If damage is dealt this way% that animas space becomes a stone tile.

name: Hu-Dyi Igniter
ability: {A}{A}: Hu-Dyi Igniter deals 1 direct fire damage to target enemy anima within four spaces. Than animas space becomes a lava tile.

name: Amitos Shambler
ability: When Amitos Shambler dies% create two copies of it with half the HP%  half base atk and def% and this ability. (Copies of a board piece count as associated board assets.) (If a copy would join the board with less than 1 HP% it is vanquished instead.)

name: Flameborn Executor
ability:
Overwhelm (Whenever this anima deals excess damage to an enemy anima% you may assign the excess damage to an anima adjacent to it as attack damage.)
When you roll the lowest number of this animas def modifier% vanquish it% it deals 1 direct fire damage to each anima in nearby spaces. Each nearby space becomes a lava tile for the next two turns.

name: Kulth% the Immolator
ability:
Flight (This anima can pass over non-traversable spaces as long as it's destination is traversable. Units without flight cannot initiate combat with this anima)
While% Kulth is moving you may spend its action and create a line of four lava tiles in any direction along its movement path. Remove these tiles after two turns.

name: Lahar Titan
ability:
Slash 2 (When this anima attacks% you may have it deal its attack damage to up to 2 adjacent units. Only one enemy anima may counterstrike.)
As long as Lahar Titan is on a lava tile% you may spend its action and move it to any lava tile within five spaces. (This effect counts as a movement.)

name: Swiftfin Initiate
ability: Swim (This anima may spend an action to traverse any number. If you do% only anima with swim can count strike it.)

name: Clearwood Archer
ability: Range 3 (This anima can attack board pieces up to 3 spaces away.)

name: Ungari Wave-Waker
ability:
Sneak (At the end of your plot phase% this anima may spend an action to move it as an evasive movement. If you do% it's speed becomes 6 until turns end and it may traverse% but not land on% occupied spaces.)
Each space Ungari Wave-Waker lands on becomes a water tile. (Landing is where a board piece movement stops.)

name: Porttolva Mystic
ability:
Swim (This anima may spend an action to traverse any number. If you do% only anima with swim can count strike it.)
Water strike (Whenever this anima would deal damage to a fire anima% it deals that much damage plus an additional 1 damage instead.)
{A}{A}: Create a line of three water tiles in an adjacent space.

name: Brood Charmer
ability:
Imbue {N}{N} (Discard this card% add {N}{N} to your wellspring. Use this ability only during your plot phases. You may imbue only once per turn.)
{A}{4}: Create a size 1 Serpent unit with% 2 HP% 2:4 atk% 2:4 def% 4 spd% 3 move% and 2 actions% near Brood Charmer.

name: Bog Mare
ability:
Swim (This anima may spend an action to traverse any number. If you do% only anima with swim can count strike it.)
When Bog Mare dies you may place a water tile on four nearby spaces.

name: Sevena Warcaller
ability: Once per turn% you may have an attacking anima you control within four spaces of Sevena Warcaller get 2 added to their base atk.

name: Dradara% of the Wreckage
ability:
Swim (This anima may spend an action to traverse any number. If you do% only anima with swim can count strike it.)
Overwhelm (Whenever this anima deals excess damage to an enemy anima% you may assign the excess damage to an anima adjacent to it as attack damage.)
As long as Dradara is in a water tile it has "{A}{3}: Create a line of three water tiles starting in an adjacent space. Remove those tiles after two turns."

name: Oakenvein Mother
ability: Whenever you cast an anima spell% create a size 1 Seedling dryadling anima with 2 HP% 3:4 atk% 1:6 def% 2 spd% 3 move% and 2 actions% near Oakenvein Mother.

name: Clearwood Hydra
ability:
Clearwood Hydra joins the board with three head tokens. 
Whenever Clearwood Hydra would take damage% you may remove a head counter from it instead. If you do% create a size 1 Serpent unit with% 2 HP% 2:4 atk% 2:4 def% 4 spd% 3 move% and 2 actions% near Clearwood Hydra.

name: Successful Coward
ability: Flee (This anima cannot be attacked while retreating.)

name: Scrap Instigator
ability: When this anima joins the board% up to one nearby anima you control gets +1 to its base atk or def until turns end.

name: Elven Sureshot
ability: Range 3 (This anima can attack assets up to 3 spaces away.)

name: Timely Spearrunner
ability: Dash (this anima may move twice each turn.)

name: Gulch Giant
ability:
Overwhelm (Whenever this anima deals excess damage to an enemy anima% you may assign the excess damage to an anima adjacent to it as attack damage.)
Whenever Gulch Giant attacks for the first time each combat% you may reroll its atk modifier as long as you control another warrior within three spaces of Gulch Giant.

name: Kypria Southpaw
ability: Slash 2 (When this anima attacks% you may have it deal its attack damage to up to 2 adjacent units. Only one enemy anima may counterstrike.)

name: Sevana Fallen
ability: Warriors you control within four spaces of Sevana Fallen have "critical hit (Whenever you roll the highest number of this animas attack modifier% double the amount of damage this anima would deal this combat.)"

name: Gulch Battle-Master
ability: Warriors you control within four spaces of Gulch Battle-Master have "Whenever this anima attacks for the first time each combat% you may reroll its atk modifier% and Initiative (This anima can use actions it's first turn on the board.)"

name: Stouthoof Banner-Runner
ability: If attack damage would be dealt to a warrior you control within four spaces of Stouthoof Banner-Runner% that damage is reduced by half rounded up.

name: Lithon Rage-Rock
ability: When Lithon Rage-Rock attacks roll X addition d4 atk modifiers where X is its base HP minus its current HP.

name: Utahn% Bloodwood Baron
ability:
Whenever Utahn attacks% put a rage token on it. 
For every three rage tokens on Uthan% anima you control within 4 spaces of it have base attack increased by 1. This effect cannot increase a base attack to more than twice is original value.

name: Klond% Legion's Bane
ability:
Slash 3 (When this anima attacks% you may have it deal its attack damage to up to 3 adjacent units. Only one enemy anima may counterstrike.)
Critical hit (Whenever you roll the highest number of this animas attack modifier% double the amount of damage this anima would deal this combat.)
